definition: incorruptible/honest/inexpensive/to investigate (old)/side wall of a traditional Chinese house (old)
William Faulkner (1897-1962), American novelist and poet

pinyin: Wei1 lian2 · Sha1 shi4 bi3 ya4

sentences.english: Caesar, William the Conquerer allopted for a full invasion of England.
sentences.chinese: 凯撒，威廉这样的征服者都选择完全的侵略英格兰。

sentences.english: William rehearse played the pain, and the demand notice to take care of health.
sentences.chinese: 威廉排戏辛苦了，需要注意保重身体。

sentences.english: Groaning, William twisted against the debris inside the guard table.
sentences.chinese: 桌下，威廉在碎石中扭动着，呻吟着。

sentences.english: Ms. Williams and her sister, though, had other issues to resolve.
sentences.chinese: 威廉斯女士和她的妹妹还有其他问题需要解决。

sentences.english: In the future, those costs could rise substantially, says Williams.
sentences.chinese: 威廉姆斯说，这些花费在将来还会大大增加。

sentences.english: Joe wanted to pay William off for backbiting him.
sentences.chinese: 乔尔因威廉在背后说他的坏话而要对他进行报复。

sentences.english: So William had to earn his own living.
Robert: Well, that's you, not me. Please call me Robert from now on.
sentences.chinese: 我的名字叫威廉，但是所有的人都叫我比利。

sentences.english: You'd look under SMITH and then WILLIAM.
sentences.chinese: 你可以先查史密斯，再查威廉。

sentences.english: Dionne and William are discussing their favorite sports.
sentences.chinese: 戴欧妮和威廉正在讨论他们所喜欢的运动种类。

sentences.english: Other blacks liked the stronger ideas of William Du Bois.
sentences.chinese: 其他黑人喜欢威廉杜博伊斯较强的想法。

sentences.english: Mrs.Rohrs will also be followed by her husband, William.
sentences.chinese: Rohrs夫人也将随后她的丈夫，威廉。

sentences.english: Dayton was substituted for Williams in the second half of the match.
sentences.chinese: 下半场比赛由戴顿代替威廉上场。

sentences.english: She is due to give birth to her first child with Prince William next month.
sentences.chinese: 她将在下个月分娩与威廉王子的第一个孩子。

sentences.english: The child in whose veins flows the blood of William Turner? where?
sentences.chinese: 那个威廉特纳的亲生骨肉呢？

sentences.english: William worked in his father's shop until his talent for drawing became so obvious.
sentences.chinese: 威廉在父亲的小店帮忙直到他的绘画才能锋芒毕露。
